resources.string: The Score Tracker is a generic score keeping app for virtually any game! The only thing you need to do to get started is to hit close out of this window and hit \"Make Game\".\n Then all that you do is answer the questions, put in the names of your players and play! Its that simple, enjoy!\n (If you seem to have trouble clicking out of this box the back button will help.)

If you lost about where to go next then hit \"Info\" for a description. Or if you are tired press \"Leave\" which will take you back to your home screen. \n (If you seem to have trouble clicking out of this box the back button will help.)
Please put a name (other than \"Game Name\") into the Game Name field.

Before playing the game of your choice, fill out the sheet in front of you.\n You must have a Game Name other than \"Game Name\" and if you check the boxes for having a score or turn limit then those fields cannot be blank or contain non-numbers.

An Unknown error has occurred.\n Please check to make sure that you do not have any blank fields that should not be there, letters in number areas, etc. If that is all in order please restart.\n We are sorry for the inconvenience.
Please check to make sure that you do not have any blank fields that should not be there, letters in number areas, etc.
Oops! It looks like you have some text in your number fields!\n Please check the Increment field as well as the two limit fields.
Sorry you cannot have a negative number of turns as a turn limit.
The Player either already exists, is blank, or is the default.
You need at least one player to play a game.
